body.p: The exposure draft published in 2002 proposed a three-tier fair value measurement hierarchy as follows:

li.p: For instruments traded in active markets, use a quoted price.
For instruments for which there is not an active market, use a recent market transaction.
For instruments for which there is neither an active market nor a recent market transaction, use a valuation technique.
